original_text: Therefore the Lord was very angry with Israel and said, “Because this nation has violated the covenant I ordained for their ancestors and has not listened to me,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하여 이르시되 이 백성이 내가 그들의 조상들에게 명령한 언약을 어기고 나의 목소리를 순종하지 아니하였은즉

sentences.original_text: Therefore the Lord was very angry with Israel
Because this nation has violated the covenant

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들의 조상들을 위해 세운 언약을

sentences.original_text: and has not listened to me
